messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
How many Magic points does Matthew owe after the explosion?
You are a helpful assistant.
How many hit points does Matthew have left after the explosion?
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the result of the Sanity point loss to Matthew?
insanity
You are a helpful assistant.
How many hit points does Matthew lose in one blow?
over half his hit points
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the consequence of Matthew losing over half his hit points in one blow?
He must make a CON roll to remain conscious.
You are a helpful assistant.
What will happen to Matthew's Sanity points after he recovers?
He will have resulted in insanity.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Keeper's action after recovering from the spell's effects?
The Keeper amends two of his background entries, one for the wound and one for the insanity.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the consequence of the caster's unnatural aging?
The caster ages unnaturally (+2D10 years and apply characteristic modifiers, see Age, page 32).
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when the Keeper loses hit points as a result of overspending Magic points?
The Keeper should narrate the physical harm as a part of the physical consequence of the casting.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of the spell on the Keeper's Sanity point?
When he recovers, the Sanity point loss will have resulted in insanity.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when the casting roll is pushed?
time for a Sanity roll!
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when the Keeper narrates the physical harm as a result of losing Magic points?
the physical harm is a part of the physical consequence of the casting.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when a spell is cast in a way that its effects are noticeable?
one might spot a peculiar hand gesture or body movement, or notice some unusual item or necessary ingredient.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when Magic points are lost as a result of overspending?
hit points are lost as a result.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are some effects of Mythos magic in the text?
wide-ranging effects including gouts of fire, lines of electrical force, pale nimbuses and auroras of various colors, and more
You are a helpful assistant.
What should Keepers do to keep certain effects low-key?
Keepers should keep such effects low-key
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of a wide-ranging effect of Mythos magic?
Call of Cthulhu-esque roars from beyond
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of a prickly sensation caused by a Mythos magic effect?
prickly sensations
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a disrupted spell casting?
A disrupted spell casting is when the casting of a spell is interrupted due to significant distraction.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a caster if they fail a pushed casting roll?
They must pay the Sanity point.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is considered a significant distraction to a caster?
A caster can be significantly distracted by being physically struck or shot.
You are a helpful assistant.
Who can consult the charts for the consequences of failing a pushed casting roll?
The Keeper can consult the charts for the consequences of failing a pushed casting roll.
